item.title: Our Tech Startup Was Acquired
item.description:
Our tech startup business was acquired. The acquisition was even reported on TechCrunch.

Sweet.

item.title: Robin Bate Boerop
item.description: Global Software Leadership Consultant I make winning software teams by providing hands-on engineering leadership. I have developed software professionally for 20 years. I have led software teams in consulting engagements and as part of Silicon Valley tech startups. I co-founded a Canadian software startup that was acquired in 2014. I advise for Tweag. Results Meet Speaking engagements Press citation Startup acquisition My c.v.
